location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 19 September.In enclosure copy of the peace agreement between Shaikh Abdullah bin Croosh [Shaikh Abdullah bin Qasim bin Qurush Āl Qāsimī] on the part of Sheikh Ul Mus Sheikh Ameer Sultan bin Suggur Bin Kashid Joasimi and Captain David Seton on the part of the Honorable East India Company, signed in Bandar Abbas on 6 February 1806, forwarded by Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay.
